Serialized Form

  • Package rrpss

    • Class AlaCarte extends Item implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          String type
          Class AlaCarte inherits attributes and methods from superclass Item

    • Class Customer extends Person implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • membership

          boolean membership
          Distinguish if object of Customer is under membership status

        • contact

          String contact
          Contact details of this Customer

    • Class Item extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          String name
          Data properties of Item (name, description, price, id) are categorised as protected type

        • description

          String description
          Description of item

        • price

          double price
          Price of item

        • id

          int id
          Identifier of item

    • Class Menu extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • alaCartes

          Vector<E> alaCartes
          List of alaCarte and setPackage, implemented in Vector data structure. Each entry consists of a reference to existing AlaCarte/SetPackageobject.

        • setPackages

          Vector<E> setPackages
          Id of alaCartes, which is equal to the size of alaCartes vector.

        • idCounter

          int idCounter
          Id of setPackages, which is equal to the size of setPackages vector.

    • Class Order extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • id

          int id
          Distinguish one object with another. This attribute is assigned in createOrder(Calendar, Staff) from OrderManager class.

        • dateTime

          Calendar dateTime
          Specify when this object is created. This attribute is assigned in createOrder(Calendar, Staff) from OrderManager class.

        • status

          String status
          Specify the status of this object.

          There are 2 type of status.

          • Active
          • Closed

        • staff

          Staff staff
          Specify the Staff who created this Order object.

        • alaCartes

          HashMap<K,V> alaCartes
          A HashMap used to store all AlaCarte objects ordered by the customer. The key is the AlaCarte object and the value associated is the quantity.

        • setPackages

          HashMap<K,V> setPackages
          A HashMap used to store all SetPackage objects ordered by the customer. The key is the SetPackage object and the value associated is the quantity.

    • Class OrderInvoice extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • totalPrice

          double totalPrice
          Stores the gross price of an order. This price is the sum of the costs of all items in exist the order. The cost of each item is determined by multiplying the price of individual item with its requested quantities.

        • order

          Order order
          Stores the Order object that customer has requested. This order will contain menu items that the customer purchased (AlaCarte and SetPackage) and its requested quantities, date and time of the Order creation, and the staff who created the Order. This object also has a print method to print out its details.

        • tableId

          int tableId
          Stores the table number to indicate from which Table an Order is made.

        • membership

          boolean membership
          Stores the membership status of the Customer.

        • totalDiscount

          double totalDiscount
          Stores the discounted amount of price to be subtracted from OrderInvoice.grandTotal. It is calculated by multiplying OrderInvoice.DISCOUNT with the grandTotal.

          This totalDiscount will only be computed if the Customer is a member of the Restaurant, otherwise the value is 0 (no discount).

        • totalGST

          double totalGST
          Stores the amount of tax to be added to the OrderInvoice.grandTotal. It is calculated by multiplying OrderInvoice.GST with OrderInvoice.grandTotal.

        • grandTotal

          double grandTotal
          Stores the net price that a Customer has to pay. This net price have already subtracted the discount totalDiscount and added with the GST totalGST.

    • Class OrderInvoiceManager extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • orderInvoices

          Vector<E> orderInvoices
          List of OrderInvoice implemented in Vector data structure. Each entry consists of reference to the existing OrderInvoice object.

    • Class OrderManager extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • orders

          Vector<E> orders
          A Vector object which stores all Order objects of a Restaurant

        • idCounter

          int idCounter
          An integer keeping track of the Order object ID in order to avoid having an Order object with the same ID as an existing Order object. This integer will be used when a new Order object is created which is done by calling OrderManager.createOrder(Calendar, Staff).

          Initially, the value of this integer is 1.

    • Class Person extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          String name
          Distinguish among objects of Staff and Customer

        • id

          int id
          Identifier (id) of this Person

    • Class Reservation extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dateTime

          Calendar dateTime
          Date and time of this Reservation, stored in Calendar data structure

        • table

          Table table
          Table object that is associated with this Reservation

        • id

          int id
          Identifier (id) of this Reservation, should be unique positive integer, handled by ReservationManager

        • status

          String status
          Status of this reservation:
        • Active: Reservation has been successfully made
        • Checked-in: Customer of the reserved table has made an Order (i.e. active order).
        • Cancelled: Reservation has been cancelled by customer
        • Finished: Customer of the reserved table has closed the Order.
        • Expired: Customer of the reserved table has not made any order within the BUFFER_TIME from the specified dateTime
See Also:
Order.status

  • customer

    Customer customer
    Customer that made this Reservation.

  • Class ReservationManager extends Object implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • reservations

        Vector<E> reservations
        List of reservations, implemented in Vector data structure. Each entry consists of a reference to existing Reservation object.

      • idCounter

        int idCounter
        Identifier (id) counter of the reservations, used to assign a unique id for new reservation. The value is one more than the size of reservations vector.

  • Class Restaurant extends Object implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • name

        String name
        The name of this restaurant

      • menu

        Menu menu
        Stores menu items (AlaCarte and SetPackage) of this restaurant.

        A menu object consists of:

        • AlaCarte, the standalone menu item
        • SetPackage, the combination of AlaCarte items
        Menu will be able to return both AlaCarte and SetPackage objects, add new menu item, remove menu item and print all menu items

      • orderManager

        OrderManager orderManager
        Manages orders in the restaurant. OrderManager is able to create order from the customer and returns the order object.

      • orderInvoiceManager

        OrderInvoiceManager orderInvoiceManager
        Manages order invoices in the restaurant. OrderInvoiceManager is able to create order invoices and return the OrderInvoice object.

      • reservationManager

        ReservationManager reservationManager
        Manages reservations in the restaurant. ReservationManager is able to keep track of the reservations, create reservation, check reservation including the reservation expiry and cancel reservation.

      • tableManager

        TableManager tableManager
        Manages tables in the restaurant. TableManager is able to get the list of tables, get its individual Table object, add new table, remove existing table, and allocate table for the customer.

      • staffManager

        StaffManager staffManager
        Manages the staffs in the restaurant. StaffManager is able to get the staff by his/her id, add new staff and remove existing staff.

  • Class SetPackage extends Item implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • alaCartes

        Vector<E> alaCartes
        Class SetPackage inherits attributes and methods from superclass Item

  • Class Staff extends Person implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • gender

        String gender
        Distinguish Staff among different genders

      • jobTitle

        String jobTitle
        Distinguish Staff by job title

  • Class StaffManager extends Object implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • staffs

        Vector<E> staffs
        A list of Staff stored in Vector data structure

  • Class Table extends Object implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • id

        int id
        The table identifier (id), idiom for table number in real world.

      • availability

        boolean availability
        True if table is available (no active Order from the table or no active Reservation for this table)

      • capacity

        int capacity
        Capacity of the table, only even number ranges from 2 until 10.

      • order

        Order order
        The Order associated with this table. Used at RestaurantApp for viewing the order.

  • Class TableManager extends Object implements Serializable

    • Serialized Fields

      • tables

        Vector<E> tables
        List of tables, implemented in Vector data structure. Each entry consists of a reference to existing Table object.

      • numTables

        int numTables
        Number of tables, which is equal to the size of tables vector.
